abstract: New York Blood Center, after 30 years of using colony of chimpanzees in Liberia for biomedical research, withdraws funding for them; animal welfare groups urge center to reconsider.
lead_paragraph: After years of using a colony of chimpanzees in Liberia for biomedical research, the New York Blood Center has withdrawn funding for them, prompting outrage from animal welfare groups.

headline.main: Chimpanzees in Liberia, Used in New York Blood Center Research, Face Uncertain Future
headline.print_headline: Used in Research for Years, Chimpanzees Lose Patron

snippet: After years of using a colony of chimpanzees in Liberia for biomedical research, the New York Blood Center has withdrawn funding for them, prompting outrage from animal welfare groups.

keywords.value: Humane Society of the United States
keywords.name: organizations
